title: Sophos Central Cloud - Alerts
description: This dashboard provides information about the Alerts generated by Sophos Central Cloud.

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security alerts by monitoring Sophos Central Cloud Alerts logs with this dashboard.
Sophos Alert refers to a notification or warning generated by Sophos Central Cloud in response to a security event or potential threat. Alerts are triggered based on predefined security policies, detection rules, or anomalous activities identified by the Sophos Central Cloud.

In the Sophos ecosystem, alerts are a curated subset of events, identified based on their significance or potential harm through proprietary rules. The Alerts Overview dashboard then provides a high-level summary and critical insights into the overall malicious activity.

For Further reading, see:

- [Sophos Central Cloud - Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/sophos_central_cloud)

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates alert logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security?query=source%3Asophos-central-cloud%20service%3Aalert%20&agg_m=count&agg_m_source=base&agg_t=count&column=time&fromUser=true&order=desc&start=1722944055154&end=1723030455154&paused=false).
